select
c.shopping_cart_id as cartId , c.member_id as memberId, p.product_title as title, p.product_price as price, p.product_img as img, p.product_delivery_charge as deliveryCharge, m2.name as name,
c.product_quantity as qty, m.point as currentPoint, g.accumulation_rate as accumulationRate
from shopping_cart as c join member m on c.member_id = m.member_id join grade g on m.grade_id = g.grade_id join product p on c.product_id = p.product_id join member m2 on p.member_id = m2.member_id
